data.title: Randolph College on LinkedIn: Randolph to present the Pearl S. Buck Award to Jetsun Pema
data.meta_description: Randolph's Pearl S. Buck Award—given to women who exemplify the ideals, values, and commitments of Buck, a member of the Class of 1914 and the first American…
data.text:
Randolph College offers an innovative, affordable, and personalized educational experience designed to meet the needs of today's students—one of the many reasons we were recently recognized as one of the nation’s “best and most interesting institutions." Read more about the honor, from "Fiske Guide to Colleges," at https://lnkd.in/eBFPZHG3! https://lnkd.in/ejuW5BFS

The sun hasn't set on #VirginiaPrivateCollegeWeek yet! There's still time to take a tour and check out our beautiful campus for yourself. Sign up to visit today or Saturday at https://lnkd.in/etRH8avq.

Nearly $9.4 million was raised for all funds, with over $1.8 million of that total supporting the Annual Fund for the College’s greatest needs.

Have you signed up for one of our #VirginiaPrivateCollegeWeek tours? If not, register at https://lnkd.in/etRH8avq to learn more about our academic programs, extracurriculars, financial aid, scholarships, and the admission process.

Quianday Worthington ’25 has spent her summer at the University of Virginia's Mountain Lake Biological Station studying the behavioral ecology of forked fungus beetles. The National Science Foundation-funded REU (Research Experiences for Undergraduates) "ties into what I want to do after graduation," she says, "focusing on behavior, why animals act differently based on their environment, and how that affects their ability to survive, find resources, and reproduce.” Read more at https://lnkd.in/eDAACtEq!

Welcome to #VirginiaPrivateCollegeWeek! Sign up for one of our two daily information sessions at https://lnkd.in/etRH8avq and get a glimpse of life behind the Red Brick Wall!

Help spread the word to prospective students: #VirginiaPrivateCollegeWeek starts on Monday, July 15! Sign up for one of our information sessions now at https://lnkd.in/etRH8avq.

Randolph has once again been recognized for our innovative curriculum, which "encourages meaningful student-faculty collaboration through experiential learning that is relevant and applicable to the real world.”

Find your perfect college fit—and what makes Randolph so special—by visiting us during #VirginiaPrivateCollegeWeek! We'll be hosting daily information sessions from July 15-20, and we can't wait to show you what being a WildCat is all about. Find out more about at https://bit.ly/2024VPCW and sign up for one of our sessions at https://lnkd.in/etRH8avq!
